Resume Audio: This action can be used to resume a previously paused sound. This can be used on any sound that has been paused using Pause Audio or Pause All Audio, and will have no effect on those sounds that have not been paused previously.
The sound resource to resume playing
The above action block code will check a global variable and if it evaluates to <tt>true</tt> then the given sound is paused, otherwise it is resumed.
